name: Lethal Tentation
description:
Overview

Lethal Tentation is a 2D puzzle game where you play as an alien jellyfish with electric powers. You find yourself on a spaceship, captured by its human staff and held as a test subject, and must escape by short-circuiting security panels and other machines with the electricity in your tentacles.

ControlsKeyboard
  • WASD / Arrow keys  - Movement
  • Space / Right Ctrl  - Shock
  • Escape - Pause
Xbox 360 Controller ( tested on Windows )
  • Left Stick - Movement
  • XYAB - Shock
  • Start - Pause
